author: Team edplore
title: Hello World!
content:
Today is Basant Panchami. 
 And today is India's Republic Day. 
 What better occasion to announce our arrival? 
 'edplore' was conceptualized more than three years back. Two whole years of deep study into students' challenges and expectations along with one and half years of rigorous development with countless feedbacks cycles are behind why this application has finally seen the light of day today. 

 Dearest Students, Thanks for everything!
